mapper.insert: insert into auction (userId, bName, pName, price, startPrice, endTime, onOff, pSize, imgUrl,num) values(#{userId}, #{bName}, #{pName}, #{price}, #{startPrice}, #{endTime}, 1, #{pSize}, #{imgUrl},auction_seq.nextval)
mapper.update: update shopuser set pass = #{pass}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, point = #{point}, grade=#{grade}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, address3 = #{address3}, phone = #{phone}, gender = #{gender} where userid = #{userid}
